data.actual_result: Discord starts to reload OR  discord completely crashes and kicks you out.
data.expected_result: Discord shows you the members of that server
data.short_description: Crashes when I open a server too early and check the Member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Load discord on an iPad running 10.0 or later - (There could be an issue with this as it only happens to me in 1 server so I'm going to specifically say the servers name) Click on the LGBTQ+ Lounge OR - Wait 5-10 mins, click on the server and try to view the members list by swiping to the left. Now I don't know if it only happens on that lgbtq+ server or it also happens to others that are not in the server
